name: Eyeball Blaster
description:
This game uses one button. Press space bar to float. Hold spacebar to fire. To gain more ammo successfully avoid obstacles, enemies, and bullets. 

Highly recommend to use full-screen for best experience..

This game has been made by @iNeedYourSkullz &  snicklefrittz

Music by mrfoxtopus

over 1 month for the Finally Finish Something 2022 Game Jam
